siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Webiny is an open-source framework that helps developers architect, build and deploy applications on top of the serverless infrastructure. Webiny also comes with a serverless CMS that runs on top of AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, and S3.
blogPost.body: Webiny is an open-source framework that helps developers architect, build and deploy applications on top of the serverless infrastructure. Webiny also comes with a serverless CMS that runs on top of AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, and S3.
blogPost.title: Webiny 5.0 - Build serverless applications and websites in minutes
blogPost.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Webiny是一个开源框架，可以帮助开发者在无服务器基础设施之上架构、构建和部署应用。Webiny还附带了一个无服务器CMS，运行在AWS Lambda、DynamoDB和S3之上。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内构建无服务器应用程序和网站

localize.description: Webiny是一個開源框架，可以幫助開發者在無服務器基礎設施之上架構、構建和部署應用。Webiny還附帶了一個無服務器CMS，運行在AWS Lambda、DynamoDB和S3之上。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內構建無服務器應用程序和網站

previous.excerpt: Graze is the first true Video Based Social Networking App. Why waste endless time messaging and going on disappointing dates? Instead, you can spend 5 minutes or less on a Video Chat to find out if you have chemistry and a dynamic worth exploring in person.
previous.title: Graze - Video first social networking for dating & meeting friends

localize.description: Graze是第一个真正的基于视频的社交网络应用。为什么要浪费无尽的时间发信息和进行令人失望的约会？相反，您可以花5分钟或更少的时间进行视频聊天，看看你们是否有化学反应和值得亲自探索的动态。
localize.tagline: 视频第一社交网络的约会和认识朋友

localize.description: Graze是第一個真正的基於視頻的社交網絡應用。爲什麼要浪費無盡的時間發信息和進行令人失望的約會？相反，您可以花5分鐘或更少的時間進行視頻聊天，看看你們是否有化學反應和值得親自探索的動態。
localize.tagline: 視頻第一社交網絡的約會和認識朋友
